emailUpdateErrMsg: Failed to update the email address!
firstNameErrorMsg: First name field cannot be empty
lastNameErrorMsg: Last name field cannot be empty
passwordValidateErrorMsg: Password must be at least 8 Characters long with one uppercase character, one lowercase character, one numeric digit and one special character
emailVerifiedMsg: This email has already been verified
forgotPasswordDescription: We will send you a link to create a new password
phoneNoUpdateErrorMsg: Failed to update the phone number
passwordChangedErrorMsg: Password Should match with Confirm password
2FaRecoveryUpdateSuccessMSg: TwoFactor Authentication Recovery Code updated successfully!
profileErrMsg: Failed to fetch profile details, Please try again!
signupAcceptPolicyText: By continuing, you agree to accept our
signupPolicyErrorDescription: Privacy and Cookie Policy must be accepted to create a new account.
mfaModalDescription: Use the code on your authentication app to login
mfaErrorDescription: The code you provided is not valid
setupMfaDescription: This will provide the security codes required to execute transactions from within the member portal. We support all authenticators
setupMfaSubDescription: Scan the QR code using an authentication app and enter the 6 digit code to confirm setup is complete
resendEmailVerificationSuccess: Sent another email link to you email!
newAccountSubtitle: Select your currency preference and an account will be automatically created for you.
newBeneficiaryFormSubtitle: Enter all details required to add a new beneficiary.
saveThisBeneficiary: Save this beneficiary in my beneficiaries list for future use
newCurrencyPairSubtitle: Enter all details required to add a new currency pair.
newTermsOfService: Accept the new terms of service
agreeToAcceptTermsOfService: I agree to accept the terms of service.
acceptTradeErrorDescription: Could not accept trade. Please try again later.
rejectTradeErrorDescription: Could not reject trade. Please try again later.
onboardNewClientErrMsg: Failed to add the new client!
onboardNewClientWarnMsg: Please complete (Tell us about your company) of selected entity!
approvalHeaderNote: To add a layer of security against unapproved high-risk transactions, keep the approval required toggle switched on and regularly review the approver group below. Make sure the users assigned to approve transactions have been carefully chosen and are authorised to approve on behalf of the company.
approvalAddRuleSubTitle: Set a required number of approvers that must approve each payment, then select the users that will have approver rights to continue. The users in the approver group must reflect or exceed the required number of approvers selected.
approvalAddRuleNote: By selecting approvers and clicking continue I hereby confirm that I am authorised to do so on behalf of the Client and that the selected persons are authorised to approve transactions on behalf of the Client. I understand that Orbital will rely upon such authorisations until the approvers are removed and on behalf of the Client agree to indemnify Orbital from any and all claims, actions and liabilities made against or suffered by Orbital as a result of relying upon this authorisation.
approvalEditRuleSubTitle: Add or remove the users you would like to include as approvers for payments or edit the required number of approvers needed. The users in the approver group must reflect or exceed the required number of approvers selected.
approvalEditRuleNote: By adding or removing approvers and clicking save I hereby confirm that I am authorised to do so on behalf of the Client and that the added persons are authorised to approve transactions on behalf of the Client while the removed persons will be disabled.
noPaymentsMsg: You have no payments in your payment queue. Any future payments will appear here for review.
approvalRuleTurnOffNote: All payments in the approval queue must be approved or rejected in order to turn off approval rule
deactivateApprovalTitle: Are you sure you want to deactivate the rule?
deactivateApprovalNote: We strongly recommend that the approval rule is turned on to protect from any incorrect or unauthorised payments.
deactivateApprovalWarning: Warning: If you deactivate the approval rule, any user with access to your accounts will be able to make payments.
deactivateApprovalAccept: I recognise that by deactivating the approval rule any user acting alone will be able to make and authorise payments from our accounts and that these transactions will not be reversible. My entity is bound to any payments authorised by its users on this platform.
approvePaymentTitle: Are you sure the payment details are correct?
approvePaymentWarning: Warning: Once a payment has been approved by the required number of approvers, funds will be transferred from your account and the transaction cannot be reversed.
rejectPaymentTitle: Are you sure this payment should be rejected?
rejectPaymentWarning: One rejection from an approver will cancel this payment.
addRuleSuccessTitle: Approval is now required for all payments
addRuleSuccessNoteOne: All future payments will now be queued in the approval queue. Each payment must be approved by the required number of approvers to be completed. If one approver rejects the payment, the transaction will be cancelled.
addRuleSuccessNoteTwo: If one approver rejects the payment, the transaction will be cancelled.
addRuleErrorTitle: Error in switching on approval rule
addRuleErrorNote: We apologise for the inconvenience. Please get in touch with your customer service representative.
editRuleSuccessTitle: The approval group has been edited
editRuleSuccessNoteOne: All future payments will now need to be approved by the updated approval group.
editRuleErrorTitle: Error in editing the aprover group
editRuleErrorNote: We apologise for the inconvenience. Please get in touch with your customer service representative.
approvePaymentErrorNote: We apologise for the inconvenience. Please get in touch with your customer service representative.
rejectPaymentErrorNote: We apologise for the inconvenience. Please get in touch with your customer service representative.
deactivateRuleErrNote: We apologise for the inconvenience. Please get in touch with your customer service representative.
